author: Charlie Paul
description: No relation to the modern Cosmopolitan, this is a mellow, balanced blend of citrus, brandy and red wine.
name: Cosmopolitan Delight
recipeIngredient: 15 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
